lead_paragraph: 3:12 p.m. | Updated The Hawks and Al Horford agreed on a five-year, $60 million contract extension before Monday's deadline, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.
snippet: Other than Kevin Durant and Joakim Noah, the rest of the 2007 draft class appears like it will not get contract extensions before the deadline today.

headline.main: Contract Extensions Elude Much of 2007 N.B.A. Draft Class

abstract: Other than Kevin Durant and Joakim Noah, the rest of the 2007 draft class appears like it will not get contract extensions before the deadline today.
